General.Name: Serrano 61 Desarrollo SOCIMI SA
General.Description: Serrano 61 Desarrollo SOCIMI, S.A. develops, finances, and manages assets in the real estate sector in Spain. The company owns and operates ABC Serrano shopping center in Madrid. It acquires and promotes urban real estate for leasing. The company was formerly known as Serrano 61 Desarrollo, S.A. and changed its name to Serrano 61 Desarrollo SOCIMI, S.A. in October 2017. Serrano 61 Desarrollo SOCIMI, S.A. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Madrid, Spain.
